author: Fox News
title: Ground News - California authorities nab ‘Master of Disguise’ after years-long manhunt
text:
Summary by Fox News A man described as a "Master of Disguise," who was wanted in Hawaii after escaping jail in 2019 has been taken into custody and will be extradited back to the state next week. Share menu More
